function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation systems in buildings leading to poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission and decreased occupant health and productivity.","Mitigation":"Upgrading ventilation systems, implementing air purification technologies, and establishing indoor air quality monitoring.","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, CO2 sensors, and IAQ monitors.","People":"Building occupants, especially those working in close proximity to others.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and employers."},{"Description":"Lack of sustainable and cost-effective building technologies for improving air quality and reducing disease transmission.","Impact":"Limited adoption of health-promoting building technologies, leading to continued health risks for occupants.","Mitigation":"Research and development of sustainable building materials and technologies, financial incentives for sustainable construction, and industry-wide adoption of green building standards.","Technologies":"Green building materials, energy-efficient HVAC systems, and sustainable construction practices.","People":"Building industry professionals, policymakers, and environmental advocates.","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, and industry organizations."}]}
